mapper.insert: insert into gen_indicator ( package_name, indicator_name, indicator_class_name, indicator_config_class_name, export_excel_class_name ) values ( #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indicatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indicatorClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indicatorConfigClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exportExcelClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: create table gen_indicator( id int generated by default as identity, package_name varchar(255), indicator_name varchar(255), indicator_class_name varchar(255), indicator_config_class_name varchar(255), export_excel_class_name varchar(255) )
